participant_1.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox. i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i hate school. i do not have many friends.

content.text: Hey! I hate school ? What about you?
When I was younger, I hated school too.
I like to be in the future.
